description: a(n) = s(1)t(n) + s(2)t(n-1) + ... + s(k)t(n-k+1), where k = floor( n/2 ), s = natural numbers >= 2, t = natural numbers >= 3.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,3,-3,-3,3,1,-1)
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(8 + 2 x - 7 x^2 - x^3 + 2 x^4)/((1 + x)^3 (x - 1)^4), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 25 2013 *)
